EmailTemplate.name: Order Status Inquiry
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Action Required: Your Order Status Inquiry
Dear Customer,
Honeywell no longer monitors this email address. Real-time information, including status, actions, and tracking of your order can be found here
VISIT ORDER STATUS
For all future parts quoting, ordering, and tracking needs, please use Honeywell’s MyAerospace customer portal.
Not a current MyAerospace user?
• Register for MyAerospace here. • View our online tools updates and tutorials here.
If this is an AOG request, please reference this page for our latest contact information: Aircraft on Ground.
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support Team
{!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
